textBox.richText: Visiting Mondorf les bains / Bad Mondorf, Luxembourg, for the imageJ conference, I was in the park for a stroll, where I found what looked like tennis courts from a distance, but no! It was a kids road safety course, with signs, traffic lights, painted lines... the whole works! I would have loved to have been able to ride my chopper through that, following instruction from PC Plod.
